EmailTemplate.name: University Welcome Trailmix Email
EmailTemplate.subject: üêù Hive New Starter Training Course [Action Required]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!trailheadapp__User_Trailmix__c.OwnerFirstName__c},
Again welcome to Hive!
We have created an exclusive Learning Trail for you containing everything you need to know about Hive for a successful start! It is designed to give you knowledge that is relevant to your day-to-day operations, so you can be more confident, productive, and successful in your role:
{!trailheadapp__User_Trailmix__c.Trailmix_Name__c}
Description: {!trailheadapp__User_Trailmix__c.Description__c}
Your success depends on having a growth mindset, and we want to prepare you for your role within eBay and support your ongoing development.
Please complete this important training.
We wish you a great start,
Team Hive
Start Course Now
